revised_title: Development of the Skull in Shrews: A Study of Chondrocranial Development
tldr: This study examines the development of the skull in shrews, focusing on the chondrocranial structures. The author describes the various components of the chondrocranium, their relationships, and their developmental stages. The research provides insights into the comparative anatomy and embryology of mammalian skulls.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Anatomy and Developmental Biology
